name: Natural Vibrations Body Cream
description:
This is the same as our other creams just unscented! 

Natural Vibrations body cream will keep your skin supple, nourished, and radiant, while making you feel refreshed, peaceful, and even more beautiful.

Natural Vibrations is full of vitamins and antioxidants. You will see a tremendous difference in your skin using this cream compared to others. Our line of body butters are one of our top sellers. If you have sensitive skin, eczema, psoriasis, or any other skin ailments, this butter will help heal your body.

Natural Vibrations is a special blend of 100% organic, wild-crafted, and sustainable butters and oils from West Africa, South America, and the Caribbean. These precious butters and healing oils were first discovered and used by our ancestors. Thank goodness for them! Some of the ingredients are shea butter, cupuacu butter, tucuma butter, baobab oil, pomegranate seed oil. It also has Beeswax which locks in moisture, stimulates cells and protects skin from damaging environmental factors. It also is a naturally nourishing moisturizer as well as being anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, anti-allergenic and an antioxidant. However this can also be made without the beeswax for our vegan brothers and sisters. Natural Vibrations absorbs into the skin in a matter of minutes, leaving your skin nourished without feeling greasy.

This body cream can be used on the face and for children over the age of 2.

Natural Vibrations is also great for after shave care! Soothes razor burns as well. This cream is unscented

All of Terra Smiles products are made with healing intentions.

We use only Organic, Sustainable and Non GMO products!

If you have any questions please never hesitate to send over a message!

name: Bee Love Facial Scrub
description:
Bee Love facial scrub gently exfoliates dead cells, brightens the skin and reduces the appearance of wrinkles with continued use. 

Bee Love facial scrub is made from local honey, organic oats, vitamin c, and organic toasted almonds. 

Almonds are fatty acids, plant fatty alcohols, and vitamins and antioxidants (mostly Vitamin E and Vitamin K).
Vitamin K is known to reduce dark circles among other things. Fatty Acids are essential to cellular membranes. It helps rebuild elasticity in skin and keeps it smooth.

Local honey is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive. It acts as an antibacterial and anti-fungal agent and helps disinfect and speed the healing process of acne. It soaks up impurities and helps detoxify your skin.It is loaded with antioxidants and helps restore damaged and wrinkled skin. It is incredibly moisturizing, but will not break you out. It naturally cleans your skin and leaves it super soft.

Organic Oatmeal contains avenanthramides, antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds that irritated skin. Oatmeal is also great for acne-prone skin because it absorbs oil from the skin’s surface. 

Bee Love is a must treat for your face!


All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions.

We use only Organic, Sustainable and Non GMO products!

Bless

name: Atabey Facial Moisturizer
description:
Atabey is the Supreme Goddess of the Taínos (our Ancestors)

Our highly anticipated face oil is finally here! Atabey is a lightweight, synergized blend of sacred raw oils and butters that help reveal healthier skin, evens out skintone, and helps prevent wrinkles and blemishes. Some of the key ingredients in Atabey are Baobab oil, Passion fruit oil (Maracuja), and Apricot Oil. 

Baobab oil is cold pressed from the seed of the baobab fruit, which is high in vitamins A and C. The fruit is from Africa's baobab tree, known as the Tree of Life, which grows throughout Central Africa. It softens wrinkles, diminishes blemishes and scars, and calms irritated and sun damaged skin.

Maracuja oil, like all the wild fruit trees growing inside the Amazon, is wild harvested once a year. Its seeds are covered by a nutricious  yellow pulp which is used to make all sort of juices and desserts.Unrefined Passion fruit oil is a rich source of vitamin C, calcium, iron, phosphorus and it is exceptionally rich in linoleic acid (75%) with soothing, moisturizing and nourishing properties. 

Apricot kernel oil is rich in gamma linoleic acid, or GLA, which comes from essential fatty acid omega-6. The GLA content in apricot kernel oil helps skin to maintain moisture balance. GLA also plays a role in firming and toning your skin. It also contains vitamin A and E, which soothe the skin and slow signs of aging.

The other powerful key ingredients in Atabey are Cocoa Butter, Sunflower oil, Rose Tea, Tamanu oil, Pomegranate Seed oil, Carrot Seed oil, and Sandalwood. 

Atabey can be used by all skin types, and throughout all seasons. It comes in a 1 oz amber dropper bottle. Use only 1-2 drops. Use within 1 year. 

All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions. 

We use only Organic, Wildcrafted, Raw, Sustainable, and Non GMO products!

If you have any questions please never hesitate to send over a message!

Bless

name: Organic Salt Soap
description:
Our Organic Sea Salt Soap is back! 

Our Sea Salt bar contains organic saponified coconut oil, organic shea butter, organic Grey Sea Salt, with a blend of organic essential oils. 

Some of the many benefits of our Sea Salt Soap

- cleanses and detoxifies face and body
- draws toxins out the body making you feel more vibrant
- great exfoliation  
- increases blood circulation

Grey sea salt is the only certified organic bath salt harvested by hand from the island of Noirmoutier near Brittany, France. For 1,500 years, salt farmers have harvested the Noirmoutier Sea salt. Harvesting the salt is a completely natural, where the only ingredients are the sea and the sun. 

Organic Grey Sea Salt from the Isle of Noirmoutier undergoes no treatment after harvesting. Neither washed, nor refined, it keeps its essential nutrients vital to the human body.

Grey bath salt is traditionally hand-harvested in Guérande, France in the Brittany region. The gray color is indicative of the salt’s natural trace minerals absorbed from its sea origins. Unwashed, unrefined, and additive-free, this gray bath salt maintains all of its health-enhancing nutrients vital to the human body like calcium, potassium, copper, zinc, iron and others

Our Organic Grey Sea Salt Soap is a one of a kind healing experience!

These bars are pretty huge, each weighs between 6-8 oz. This soap will last you several months, if you keep it out the shower. 

 All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions.

We use only Organic, Sustainable and Non GMO products!

*This comes in two strengths, Extra Strength and Regular, Please specify during checkout*

Conventional deodorant today has many toxins, one of the main ingredients is aluminum. Aluminum compounds are a key ingredient in deodorants because they have the ability to close your pores in order to stop odor and sweat from escaping the body. But what is actually happening is the toxins are still there however they just can't escape.. Our body has sweat glands for a reason... We use them to remove toxins and to regulate our body temperature. Aluminum compounds prohibit our bodies from naturally doing what it is designed to do. name: Gratitude for Superfood Face Mask
description:
Our Gratitude for Superfood  is the ultimate skin food. Gratitude for Superfood can be used as a facial mask or a facial scrub. With each use, this mask will help to fill in lines and wrinkles, will help keep an even skin tone, will improve elasticity by tightening and lifting, will keep your skin with a radiant, youthful glow.  

Some of the ingredients that make this skin food so nourishing are:
Chia seeds (Salvia hispanica) are an ancient food once used by my ancestors as traveling food. Chia Seeds are a rich source of antioxidants, omega-3 fatty acids, alpha-linolenic acid and lots of minerals.  Chia seeds also helps reduce inflammation. Another staple ingredient are flax seeds. Flax seeds are a natural way to cleanse the skin by normalizing oily, dry or blemished skin.  Flax also helps stimulate circulation and leaves the skin soft and smooth. Another main ingredient is Oat Flour. Many cultures have used Oats to treat irritated skin. Oat Flour is known to soften and reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Oat Flour also minimizes scarring from acne and other blemishes. Oat Flour is also an anti-inflammatory. Another big ingredient is the Chaga mushroom. Chaga is a wild mushroom, that grows on birch trees in extremely cold regions of northern latitudes including Baltic regions, Scandinavia, Siberia, Alaska and Asia. Chaga mushrooms have the highest ORAC score.  What is the Oxygen Radical Absorbance Capacity (ORAC)? The ORAC scale designed by the USDA, measures the amount of free oxygen radicals that a food, or supplement can absorb in your body. Chaga has the highest ORAC score for natural foods or supplements. Oxidative stress caused by free radicals, has been demonstrated to accelerate the aging process.
 
Other ingredients are brown rice flour, white kaolin clay, dead sea mud, kelp, and a blend of essential oils. 

To use as mask Recommended) mix a tsp or so in water or mash an avocado and let sit 20 minutes then rinse. You will feel your skin tightening and benefiting as soon as it starts to dry. To use as a facial scrub mix a tsp or so with water, or oil and let sit 3-5 minutes and scrub. 


All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions.

We use only Organic, Sustainable and Non GMO products!

name: Salts of the Earth
description:
Bokek Dead Sea salt is harvested from the southern shores of the Dead Sea in Israel, where the absorption of the minerals is the highest. Recommended for regular use as a beauty enhancer, Bokek® Premium Dead Sea Bath Salts leave your skin looking more radiant, giving you a natural looking, healthy glow. It is widely recognized for not only its relaxing & therapeutic effects, but also for its detoxifying, healing, and restoring properties. It is especially good for people with psoriasis and eczema.

Dead Sea Salt contains 10 times more minerals than ordinary sea salt, minerals which assist in cleansing, detoxifying and restoring a healthy status quo to the body, especially the skin and muscles.

Dead Sea Salt is known to help the following conditions:

    • Acne
    • Aging & Skin Problems
    • Arthritic Disorders
    • Atopic Dermatitis/Eczema
    • Cellulite
    • Dry Skin
    • General Stress
    • Insomnia
    • Psoriasis
    • Skin Problems
    • Wrinkling

Dead Sea Salt is one of Mama Earth's many great healing gifts! 

It has a beautiful light calming scent of organic essential oils of Lavender and Eucalyptus for added benefits.

name: Spiced Up! Sugar Scrub
description:
The new and improved better than ever Spiced Up! sugar scrub not only smells delicious but it 100% nourishes your skin, aids in circulation, while also keeping your skin supple, radiant and glowing all with one use! 

Why is exfoliation so important?

Our outermost layer of skin, the epidermis, contains old skin cells that are ready to shed. Exfoliation speeds up the process of shedding dead skin. The moisture in brown sugar won't dry out your skin as you exfoliate. Exfoliation removes not only dead cells from your skin but other impurities that clogs your pores. Brown sugar is a great source of B vitamins due to its molasses content. Vitamin B prevents and reverses damage done to your skin. Brown Sugar also has the ability to lighten hyper-pigmentation, too much sun exposure, and dark spots. 

Spiced Up! contains organic brown sugar, organic secret spicy special blend of spices, and organic essential oils, which are then blended with our signature raw body cream. So you get two 2 products in one!


All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions

name: Nefertiti Sun Body Cream
description:
Our Nefertiti Sun body cream will keep your skin supple, nourished, and radiant, while making you feel refreshed, peaceful, and even more beautiful.

Nefertiti means "the beauty has arrived" Nefertiti is known for her elegant beauty. Many societies around the world have adopted the queen as a symbol of true beauty. Some proclaimed her to be the most beautiful woman in the world.


Nefertiti's Sun is full of vitamins and antioxidants. You will see a tremendous difference in your skin using this cream compared to others. Our line of body butters are top sellers at our farmers markets. If you have sensitive skin, eczema, psoriasis, or any other skin ailments, this butter will help heal your body.

 Nefertiti is a special blend of 100% organic, wild-crafted, and sustainable exotic butters and oils from West Africa, South America, and the Caribbean. These precious butters and healing oils were first discovered and used by our ancestors. Thank goodness for them! Some of the ingredients are shea butter, cupuacu butter, murumuru butter, and baobab oil. It also has Beeswax which locks in moisture, stimulates cells and protects skin from damaging environmental factors. It also is a naturally nourishing moisturizer as well as being anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, anti-allergenic and an antioxidant. However this can also be made without the beeswax for our vegan brothers and sisters. Nefertiti absorbs into the skin in a matter of minutes, leaving your skin nourished without feeling greasy.

This body cream can be used on the face and for children over the age of 2.

Nefertiti is also great for after shave care! Soothes razor burns as well.

Nefertiti Sun has a scent of German chamomile and ylang ylang, very light and unique!

name: Vital Energy Ginger Body Cream
description:
Similar to our Nefertiti's Sun and Cocoa Meadows. This body cream keeps the skin supple, nourished and deeply moisturized with a hint of ginger which will energize and lift your spirits up! If you have sensitive skin, eczema, psoriasis, or any other skin ailments, this butter will help heal your body.

Vital Energy is full of vitamins and antioxidants is a special blend of 100% organic, wild-crafted, and sustainable exotic butters and oils from West Africa, South America, and the Caribbean. These precious butters and healing oils were first discovered and used by our ancestors. Thank goodness for them! Some of the ingredients are shea butter, cupuacu butter, murumuru butter, and baobab oil. It also has Beeswax which locks in moisture, stimulates cells and protects skin from damaging environmental factors. It also is a naturally nourishing moisturizer as well as being an anti-inflammatory, an antibacterial, an anti-allergenic and an antioxidant. However this can also be made without the beeswax for our vegan brothers and sisters. Vital Energy absorbs into the skin in a matter of minutes, leaving your skin nourished without feeling greasy. 

This body cream can be used on the face and for children over the age of 2.

Vital Energy is also great for after shave care! Soothes razor burns as well.

All of Terra Smiles products are made with positive energy and healing intentions

We use only Organic, Sustainable and Non GMO products!

name: Hair Food
description:
NEW VERSION COMING SOON!!!

We have had a lot of requests to create a healing, restoring, mineral and nutrient rich hair product other than our Roots Hair mist. Terra Smiles Hair Food is a deep oil treatment for the hair and also treats split ends.

One of the main ingredients is the Jamacain black castor oil. This castor oil has an age old reputation as the all purpose powerful healing oil. Jamaican black castor oil is an unrefined form of castor oil which is much richer in nutritive properties that has been proven to be extremely effective for increasing hair growth by increasing blood flow to the scalp and supplying valuable nutrients to the hair follicles. It is also used for treating damaged, brittle and dry hair by providing hydration to the hair and scalp. High in Vitamin E and Omega 6 fatty acids, it moisturizes by acting as a humectant to attract and lock moisture into the hair.

Jamaican Black Castor oil is know to do the following:

-Stimulates and increases hair growth

-Reduces and prevents hair damage

-Eliminates dry hair

-Prevents dandruff

-Wards off infections that causes hair loss

-Thickens hair that is starting to thin out

Another key ingredient is Apple Cider Vinegar. ACV is known to stimulate hair follicles and increase circulation in scalp which promotes growth. As blood circulates, essential nutrients are carried to hair follicle cells. The more efficient circulation you have, the more nutrients reach these follicles, strengthening your roots and promoting a healthy head of hair.


Other ingredients are organic coconut oil, and organic essential oils that promote hair growth.

This can be used as a deep conditioner or you can run a drop through the ends of hair to prevent split ends.

name: Foot Deodorizer
description:
This is an absorbent, stimulating powder to use especially in hot weather. Its the perfect choice for deodorizing smelly, tired feet.

This comes in a recycled cardboard tube with an adjustable dispensing lid and holds about 4 ounces.

It is made with organic baking soda, organic powdered dried sage, organic white clay, and a special anti bacterial mixture of organic essential oils.
